C

changeDecryptBtnState() - Method in class gui.VigenereGui
Enables the Decrypt Button; if the letters and ciphertext file is loaded.
changeNavigationBtnStates() - Method in class gui.ViewDetails
This method is used to determine whether the navigation buttons should be enabled or disabled.
chart - Variable in class gui.ViewDetails
 
CHART_SIZE - Static variable in class gui.ViewDetails
 
cipher(String, boolean) - Method in class vigenere.Vigenere
The cipher() method is used to encrypt, and decrypt messages (the received boolean indicates the formula which will be used).
ciphertext - Variable in class vigenere.Vigenere
 
clearKeywords() - Method in class gui.VigenereGui
The clearKeywords() method is used to clear both the stored keywords in the vigenere object, and the keywords DefaultListModel structure.
COLUMN_DECRYPTION_FREQUENCY - Static variable in class gui.ViewDetails
 
COLUMN_DIFFERENCE - Static variable in class gui.ViewDetails
 
COLUMN_LANGUAGE_FREQUENCY - Static variable in class gui.ViewDetails
 
COLUMN_LETTER - Static variable in class gui.ViewDetails
 
commonDivisor(int, int) - Static method in class vigenere.Vigenere
The CommonDivisor method is used recursively, and in conjuction with the getKeyLength() method which is used to find the greatest common devisor between the subset character distance and the key length.
compareTo(Message) - Method in class vigenere.Message
 
count - Variable in class vigenere.Letter
 
countMatches() - Method in class vigenere.Message
The countMatches() method iterates throughout the Letter Structure, and calculates a rounded difference between the messages Letter frequency and the languages average frequency.
createChart(Message) - Static method in class gui.ViewDetails
The createChart() method uses the external JFreeChart library in order to have the capability to create the chart.
